text: A midibus is a minibus which is larger than a minibus but smaller than a single decker bus. The midibus is most common in the United Kingdom. Bus companies have found them more economical. ==Models== *Alexander Dennis Enviro200 Dart - also manufactured and marketed in North America by New Flyer Industries as the New Flyer MiDi *Alexander Dennis Enviro200 MMC *Gillig Low Floor (29 and 35 ft variants) *New Flyer Xcelsior (35 ft variants) *ARBOC Specialty Vehicles *BYD Auto K7/K7M *Thomas Built Buses Saf-T-Liner HDX (25, 30, 35 ft variants) *Agrale MT12 (chassis) *Autosan Sancity 9 LE *Autosan Sancity 10LF -
